A home management workshop was organized with the support of Retaj Salwa Resort
12  May,  2024
The aim was to diversify the types of activities and events offered to the participants, all of which aim to develop their life skills and satisfy their various hobbies and interests according to the nature of the age group of the program. Twenty-two members (from both groups) from Al-Aqsa Girls' Preparatory School participated in the workshop, with support from Rotana Salalah Resort. During the workshop, the members were practically trained on how to prepare and cook pizza at home. The workshop's activities were well received and greatly appreciated by the participants.
